description: Pappas Artisanal is a great wood-fired rotisserie restaurant that's nestled in old town La Verne, California, and now you can get their delicious cuisine from their food truck as well! Serving up sustainably raised, hormone and antibiotic free meats and treats, our goal is to bring communities together through great food and forward thinking education.We cater. We office party. We festival party. We teach.  Our menus change regularly because our chefs like to get creative with seasonal ingredients. Hope to see you soon.  Happy eating!  Happy learning!
name: Pappas Artisanal
